Yes, but the explosion of my ISS replica made me so angry that I could kill every kerbal, because it was Jeb fault: he said that forgot to slow down the ship, and the rocket collided with the station and BOOOOOM, sooooooooo annoying.

The user below me had this problem with his space station.

Edited November 6, 2013 by EuSouONumero345

Yup, but... QUICKSAVES lol!

The user below realize that his/her space station was already to old even before finishing it

Space stations? Bah! Back in my day, we went places on one tank of gas and that was that. None of this "fueling station" or "Permanent presence in space" business. If we wanted to be permanent, we landed on the Mun and we stayed there!

User below me likes old and public domain books.

No. I read a few but I feel they're too wordy.

true,
